doc.title: 12th and Ripley
doc.plot: Being dumped only made Eddie more determined than ever to save his fairytale romance. Leap inside his mind as he clings to distorted images of the past, and follow his crumbling sense of reality to its crash landing at the corner of 12th and Ripley.
